mapper.select: select TO_CHAR(RESV_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESV_DATE,baby_no,resv_status,resv_no from reservation where baby_no=(select baby_no from baby where baby_no=#{baby_no}) order by resv_date

select a.resv_date,d.dis_name,a.resv_status from reservation a ,DIAGNOSIS b,disease d where a.resv_no=b.resv_no and b.dis_code=d.dis_code and a.baby_no = (select baby_no from baby where baby_no=#{baby_no})
